name: Space-Kaboom!
description:
Play Game will take you to the game. Pls note the game is not complete, the scoring system does not work, and the controls have some issues. 

Controls: Up Key to go down, Down Key to up and Space to shoot.   To return back to the main menu, refresh the page. Sorry for the inconvenience. :( 

Play Cutscenes will take you to the cutscenes that will take place if you reached the maximum score in the game.
